title: Scale and Growth With Jushi Holdings CFO Kim Bambach
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Kimberly Bambach is CFO at Jushi Holdings, a growing US multi state operator with a strong capital market background. Pursuing accretive acquisitions, targeted approaches, raising debt for scale and growth. Overwhelming competence as currency, raising guidance, plans for new and existing markets in the US.
